page.title: 09ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: Ellon is an{entertainment centre}for the surrounding rural area providing quite a wide range of entertainment for all age groups. Entertainment can be found in the form of anything ranging from{working men's clubs}to {hotels and inns}where it is possible to participate in such activities as {darts and pool.}The hotel proprietors often allow local fund raising organisations to hold{discos}in their function halls aimed towards the youth of the community. For the older generation entertainment comes in the form of{country n' western concerts, {dances and bingo.}At certain times of the year the local drama club and school organise{drama productions and {pantomines}to provide entertainment for the whole community. Often the proceeds are donated to local charities in the area.
